column1: After carefully  considering  the  submissions  of both  counsels  and  their evidence  before

column2: the High Court, we are of the view that the prosecution  had  not proved the case  beyond
reasonable  doubt. Therefore,  we  set  aside  the  conviction  and  sentence  pronounced  by
the Learned  Trial Judge in the High Court and  find  that the accused  appellants not guilty
Both accused appellants are acquitted and appeal allowed.

column4: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL

column1: s.  Devika de L.  Tennekoon, J

column4: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
